translations: 阴郁的；惨淡的，无精打采的

sentences.sentence: The kitchen was dank and cheerless.
Brazilians look gloomily forward to a New Year that even the president admits will be grey and cheerless.
sentences.translation: 巴西民众沮丧地期待着一个连总统都承认将会是阴郁而沉闷的新年。

sentences.sentence: Looking up at her friend, she was struck by his sad and cheerless face.
sentences.translation: 她抬头望着她的朋友，撞上他那悲伤而沮丧的脸。
